response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,000,000. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to you at $800,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a price that reflects its true market value. We kindly request your consideration at $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure mutual satisfaction and to capitalize on the opportunity to share this exceptional product with someone who appreciates its qualities as much as we do. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 950000}
